# 1246 Find The Multipl（BFS来打表） - PeterBishop - CSDN博客





2018年07月26日 21:35:45[PeterBishop0](https://me.csdn.net/qq_40061421)阅读数：26
个人分类：[POJ](https://blog.csdn.net/qq_40061421/article/category/7589386)









```cpp
/*代码一：广搜加打表，速度极快，广搜每一位是0还是1，幸好题目的数据范围没有超过int*/
/*---------------------*/
#define N 200 
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<cstdio>
#include<queue>
queue<long long>que; 
int main()
{
    freopen("1.out","w",stdout);
    for(int i=1;i<=N;++i)
    {
        que.push(1);
        while(!que.empty())
        {
            long long x=que.front();
            que.pop();
            if(x%i==0)
            {
                cout<<x<<",";
                break;
            }
            que.push(x*10);
            que.push(x*10+1);
        }
        while(!que.empty()) que.pop();
    }
    return 0;
}
/*-----------------------------------------------------------*/
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
long long ans[201]={0,1,10,111,100,10,1110,1001,1000,111111111,10,11,11100,1001,10010,1110,10000,11101,1111111110,11001,100,10101,110,110101,111000,100,10010,1101111111,100100,1101101,1110,111011,100000,111111,111010,10010,11111111100,111,110010,10101,1000,11111,101010,1101101,1100,1111111110,1101010,10011,1110000,1100001,100,100011,100100,100011,11011111110,110,1001000,11001,11011010,11011111,11100,100101,1110110,1111011111,1000000,10010,1111110,1101011,1110100,10000101,10010,10011,111111111000,10001,1110,11100,1100100,1001,101010,10010011,10000,1111111101,111110,101011,1010100,111010,11011010,11010111,11000,11010101,1111111110,1001,11010100,10000011,100110,110010,11100000,11100001,11000010,111111111111111111,100,101,1000110,11100001,1001000,101010,1000110,100010011,110111111100,1001010111,110,111,10010000,1011011,110010,1101010,110110100,10101111111,110111110,100111011,111000,11011,1001010,10001100111,11101100,1000,11110111110,11010011,10000000,100100001,10010,101001,11111100,11101111,11010110,11011111110,11101000,10001,100001010,110110101,100100,10011,100110,1001,1111111110000,11011010,100010,1100001,11100,110111,11100,1110001,11001000,10111110111,10010,1110110,1010100,10101101011,100100110,100011,100000,11101111,11111111010,1010111,1111100,1111110,1010110,11111011,10101000,10111101,111010,1111011111,110110100,1011001101,110101110,100100,110000,100101111,110101010,11010111,11111111100,1001111,10010,100101,110101000,1110,100000110,1001011,1001100,1010111010111,110010,11101111,111000000,11001,111000010,101010,110000100,1101000101,1111111111111111110,111000011,1000};
int main()
{
    int n;
    while(cin>>n)
    {
        if(n==0) break;
        cout<<ans[n]<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
```
